name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
desc: Deal an additional 20% damage (+20% per stack) to bosses.

name: Backup Magazine
desc: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Secondary skill.

name: Bison Steak
desc: Increases maximum health by 25 (+25 per stack).

name: Bundle of Fireworks
desc: Activating an interactable launches 8 (+4 per stack) fireworks that deal 300% base damage.

name: Bustling Fungus
desc: After standing still for 1 second, create a zone that heals for 4.5% (+2.25% per stack) of your health every second to all allies within 3m (+1.5m per stack).

name: Cautious Slug
desc: Increases base health regeneration by +3 hp/s (+3 hp/s per stack) while outside of combat.

name: Crowbar
desc: Deal +75% (+75% per stack) damage to enemies above 90% health.

name: Delicate Watch
desc: Increase damage by 20% (+20% per stack). Taking damage to below 25% health breaks this item.

name: Energy Drink
desc: Sprint speed is improved by 25% (+25% per stack).

name: Focus Crystal
desc: Increase damage to enemies within 13m by 20% (+20% per stack).

name: Gasoline
desc: Killing an enemy ignites all enemies within 12m (+4m per stack) for 150% base damage. Additionally, enemies burn for 150% (+75% per stack) base damage.

name: Item Scrap, White
desc: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

name: Lens-Maker's Glasses
desc: Your attacks have a 10% (+10% per stack) chance to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.

name: Medkit
desc: 2 seconds after getting hurt, heal for 20 plus an additional 5% (+5% per stack) of maximum health.

name: Mocha
desc: Increases attack speed by 7.5% (+7.5 per stack) and movement speed by 7% (+7% per stack).

name: Monster Tooth
desc: Killing an enemy spawns a healing orb that heals for 8 plus an additional 2% (+2% per stack) of maximum health.

name: Oddly-shaped Opal
desc: Increase armor by 100 (+100 per stack) while out of danger.

name: Paul's Goat Hoof
desc: Increases movement speed by 14% (+14% per stack).

name: Personal Shield Generator
desc: Gain a shield equal to 8% (+8% per stack) of your maximum health. Recharges outside of danger.

name: Power Elixir
desc: Taking damage to below 25% health consumes this item, healing you for 75% of maximum health.

name: Repulsion Armor Plate
desc: Reduce all incoming damage by 5 (+5 per stack). Cannot be reduced below 1.

name: Roll of Pennies
desc: Gain 3 (+3 per stack) gold on taking damage from an enemy. Scales over time.

name: Rusted Key
desc: A hidden cache containing an item (80%/20%) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cache consumes this item.

name: Soldier's Syringe
desc: Increases attack speed by 15% (+15% per stack).

name: Sticky Bomb
desc: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 180% TOTAL damage.

name: Stun Grenade
desc: 5% (+5% on stack) chance on hit to stun enemies for 2 seconds.

name: Topaz Brooch
desc: Gain a temporary barrier on kill for 15 health (+15 per stack).

name: Tougher Times
desc: 15% (+15% per stack) chance to block incoming damage. Unaffected by luck.

name: Tri-Tip Dagger
desc: 10% (+10% per stack) chance to bleed an enemy for 240% base damage.

name: Warbanner
desc: On level up or starting the Teleporter event, drop a banner that strengthens all allies within 16m (+8m per stack). Raise attack and movement speed by 30%.

name: AtG Missile Mk. 1
desc: 10% chance to fire a missile that deals 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage.

name: Bandolier
desc: 18% (+10% per stack) chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.

name: Berzerker's Pauldron
desc: Killing 4 enemies within 1 second sends you into a frenzy for 6s (+4s per stack). Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.
modifiers: AOE, Attack Speed, Movement, on-kill effect

name: Chronobauble
desc: Slow enemies on hit for -60% movement speed for 2s (+2s per stack).

name: Death Mark
desc: Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death, increasing damage taken by 50% from all sources for 7 (+7 per stack) seconds.

name: Fuel Cell
desc: Hold an additional equipment charge (+1 per stack). Reduce equipment cooldown by 15% (+15% per stack).

name: Ghor's Tome
desc: 4% (+4% on stack) chance on kill to drop a treasure worth $25. Scales over time.

name: Harvester's Scythe
desc: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes heal for 8 (+4 per stack) health.

name: Hopoo Feather
desc: Gain +1 (+1 per stack) maximum jump count.

name: Hunter's Harpoon
desc: Killing an enemy increases movement speed by 125%, fading over 1 (+0.5 per stack) seconds.

name: Ignition Tank
desc: Ignite effects deal +300% (+300% per stack) more damage over time.

name: Infusion
desc: Killing an enemy increases your health permanently by 1 (+1 per stack), up to a maximum of 100 (+100 per stack) health.

name: Item Scrap, Green
desc: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

name: Kjaro's Band
desc: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage over time. Recharges every 10 seconds.

name: Leeching Seed
desc: Dealing damage heals you for 1 (+1 per stack) health.

name: Lepton Daisy
desc: Release a healing nova during the Teleporter event, healing all nearby allies for 50% of their maximum health. Occurs 1 (+1 per stack) times.

name: Old Guillotine
desc: Instantly kill Elite monsters below 13% (+13% per stack) health.

name: Old War Stealthkit
desc: Falling below 25% health causes you to gain 40% movement speed and invisibility for 5s. Recharges every 30 seconds (-50% per stack).

name: Predatory Instincts
desc: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes increase attack speed by 12%. Maximum cap of 36% (+24% per stack) attack speed.

name: Razorwire
desc: Getting hit causes you to explode in a burst of razors, dealing 160% damage. Hits up to 5 (+2 per stack) targets in a 25m (+10m per stack) radius

name: Red Whip
desc: Leaving combat boosts your movement speed by 30% (+30% per stack).

name: Regenerating Scrap
desc: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with Uncommon 3D Printers. At the start of each stage, it regenerates.

name: Rose Buckler
desc: Increase armor by 30 (+30 per stack) while sprinting.

name: Runald's Band
desc: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic ice blast, slowing them by 80% for 3s (+3s per stack) and dealing 250% (+250% per stack) TOTAL damage. Recharges every 10 seconds.

name: Shipping Request Form
desc: A delivery containing 2 items (79%/20%/1%) will appear in a random location on each stage. (Increases rarity chances of the items per stack).

name: Shuriken
desc: Activating your Primary skill also throws a shuriken that deals 400% (+100% per stack) base damage. You can hold up to 3 (+1 per stack) shurikens which all reload over 10 seconds.

name: Squid Polyp
desc: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret that attacks nearby enemies at 100% (+100% per stack) attack speed. Lasts 30 seconds.

name: Ukulele
desc: 25% chance to fire chain lightning for 80% TOTAL damage on up to 3 (+2 per stack) targets within 20m (+2m per stack).

name: War Horn
desc: Activating your Equipment gives you +70% attack speed for 8s (+4s per stack).

name: Wax Quail
desc: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward by 10m (+10m per stack).

name: Will-o'-the-wisp
desc: On killing an enemy, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius for 350% (+280% per stack) base damage.

name: 57 Leaf Clover
desc: All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for a favorable outcome.

name: Aegis
desc: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier for 50% (+50% per stack) of the amount you healed.

name: Alien Head
desc: Reduce skill cooldowns by 25% (+25% per stack).

name: Ben's Raincoat
desc: Prevents 1 (+1 per stack) debuff and instead grants a temporary barrier for 10% of maximum health. Recharges every 5 seconds.

name: Bottled Chaos
desc: Trigger a random equipment effect 1 (+1 per stack) time(s).

name: Brainstalks
desc: Upon killing an elite monster, enter a frenzy for 4s (+4s per stack) where skills have 0.5s cooldowns.

name: Brilliant Behemoth
desc: All your attacks explode in a 4m (+2.5m per stack) radius for a bonus 60% TOTAL damage to nearby enemies.

name: Ceremonial Dagger
desc: Killing an enemy fires out 3 homing daggers that deal 150% (+150% per stack) base damage.

name: Defensive Microbots
desc: Shoot down 1 (+1 per stack) projectiles within 20m every 0.5 seconds. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.

name: Dio's Best Friend
desc: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability.

name: Frost Relic
desc: Killing an enemy surrounds you with an ice storm that deals 1200% damage per second and slows enemies by 80% for 1.5s. The storm grows with every kill, increasing its radius by 2m. Stacks up to 18m (+12m per stack).

name: H3AD-5T v2
desc: Increase jump height. Creates a 5m-100m radius kinetic explosion on hitting the ground, dealing 1000%-10000% base damage that scales up with fall distance. Recharges in 10 (-50% per stack) seconds.

name: Happiest Mask
desc: Killing enemies has a 7% chance to spawn a ghost of the killed enemy with 1500% damage. Lasts 30s (+30s per stack).

name: Hardlight Afterburner
desc: Add +2 (+2 per stack) charges of your Utility skill. Reduces Utility skill cooldown by 33%.

name: Interstellar Desk Plant
desc:
On kill, plant a healing fruit seed that grows into a plant after 5 seconds.

The plant heals for 5% of maximum health every 0.5 second to all allies within 10m (+5.0m per stack). Lasts 10 seconds.

name: Item Scrap, Red
desc: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

name: Laser Scope
desc: Critical Strikes deal an additional 100% damage (+100% per stack).

name: N'kuhana's Opinion
desc: Store 100% (+100% per stack) of healing as Soul Energy. After your Soul Energy reaches 10% of your maximum health, fire a skull that deals 250% of your Soul Energy as damage.

name: Pocket I.C.B.M.
desc: All missile items and equipment fire an additional 2 missiles. Increase missile damage by 0% (+50% per stack)

name: Rejuvenation Rack
desc: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more.

name: Resonance Disc
desc: Killing 4 enemies in 7 seconds charges the Resonance Disc. The disc launches itself toward a target for 300% base damage (+300% per stack), piercing all enemies it doesn't kill, and then explodes for 1000% base damage (+1000% per stack). Returns to the user, striking all enemies along the way for 300% base damage (+300% per stack).

name: Sentient Meat Hook
desc: 20% (+20% per stack) chance on hit to fire homing hooks at up to 10 (+5 per stack) enemies for 100% TOTAL damage.

name: Shattering Justice
desc: After hitting an enemy 5 times, reduce their armor by 60 for 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.

name: Soulbound Catalyst
desc: Kills reduce equipment cooldown by 4s (+2s per stack).

name: Spare Drone Parts
desc: Gain Col. Droneman. Drones gain +50% (+50% per stack) attack speed and cooldown reduction. Drones gain 10% chance to fire a missile on hit, dealing 300% TOTAL damage. Drones gain an automatic chain gun that deals 6x100% damage, bouncing to 2 enemies.
modifiers: Damage, Attack Speed, Spawn, Cooldowns, Missiles, on-hit effect

name: Symbiotic Scorpion
desc: 100% chance on hit to reduce armor by 2 (+2 per stack) permanently.

name: Unstable Tesla Coil
desc: Fire out lightning that hits 3 (+2 per stack) enemies for 200% base damage every 0.5s. The Tesla Coil switches off every 10 seconds.

name: Wake of Vultures
desc: Gain the power of any killed elite monster for 8s (+5s per stack).

name: Artifact Key
desc: A stone shard with immense power.

name: Charged Perforator
desc: 10% chance on hit to down a lightning strike, dealing 500% (+500% per stack) damage.

name: Defense Nucleus
desc: Killing elite monsters spawns an Alpha Construct with bonus 300% damage and 300% health. Limited to 4 (+4 per stack).
modifiers: Damage, heal, HP, Spawn, Elite, on-kill effect

name: Empathy Cores
desc: Every 30 seconds, summon two Solus Probes that gain +100% (+100% per stack) damage per ally on your team.

name: Genesis Loop
desc: Falling below 25% health causes you to explode, dealing 6000% base damage. Recharges every 30 / (2 +1 per stack) seconds .

name: Halcyon Seed
desc: Summon Aurelionite during the teleporter event. It has 100% (+50% per stack) damage and 100% (+100% per stack) health.

name: Irradiant Pearl
desc: Increases ALL stats by 10% (+10% per stack).

name: Item Scrap, Yellow
desc: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

name: Little Disciple
desc: Fire a tracking wisp for 300% (+300% per stack) damage. Fires every 1.6 seconds while sprinting. Fire rate increases with movement speed.

name: Mired Urn
desc: While in combat, the nearest 1 (+1 per stack) enemies to you within 13m will be 'tethered' to you, dealing 100% damage per second, applying tar, and healing you for 100% of the damage dealt.

name: Molten Perforator
desc: 10% chance on hit to call forth 3 magma balls from an enemy, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) damage each.

name: Pearl
desc: Increases maximum health by 10% (+10% per stack).

name: Planula
desc: Heal from incoming damage for 15 (+15 per stack).

name: Queen's Gland
desc: Every 30 seconds, summon a Beetle Guard with bonus 300% damage and 100% health. Can have up to 1 (+1 per stack) Guards at a time.

name: Shatterspleen
desc: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical Strikes bleed enemies for 240% base damage. Bleeding enemies explode on death for 400% (+400% per stack) damage, plus an additional 15% (+15% per stack) of their maximum health.

name: Titanic Knurl
desc: Increase maximum health by 40 (+40 per stack) and base health regeneration by +1.6 hp/s (+1.6 hp/s per stack).

name: Beads of Fealty
desc: Seems to do nothing... but...

name: Brittle Crown
desc:
30% chance on hit to gain 2 (+2 per stack) gold. Scales over time.

Lose gold on taking damage equal to 100% (+100% per stack) of the maximum health percentage you lost.

name: Corpsebloom
desc: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more. All healing is applied over time. Can heal for a maximum of 10% (-50% per stack) of your health per second.

name: Defiant Gouge
desc: Using a Shrine summons enemies (stronger per stack) nearby. Scales over time.

name: Egocentrism
desc: Every 3 (-50% per stack) seconds, gain an orbiting bomb that detonates on impact for 360% damage, up to a maximum of 3 bombs (+1 per stack). Every 60 seconds, a random item is converted into this item.

name: Essence of Heresy
desc:
Replace your Special Skill with Ruin.

Dealing damage adds a stack of Ruin for 10 (+10 per stack) seconds. Activating the skill detonates all Ruin stacks at unlimited range, dealing 300% damage plus 120% damage per stack of Ruin. Recharges after 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.

name: Eulogy Zero
desc: Items have a 5% (+5% per stack) chance to become a Lunar item instead.

name: Focused Convergence
desc: Teleporters charge 30% (+30% per stack) faster, but the size of the Teleporter zone is 50% (-50% per stack) smaller.

name: Gesture of the Drowned
desc: Reduce Equipment cooldown by 50% (+15% per stack). Forces your Equipment to activate whenever it is off cooldown.

name: Hooks of Heresy
desc:
Replace your Secondary Skill with Slicing Maelstrom.

Charge up a projectile that deals 875% damage per second to nearby enemies, exploding after 3 seconds to deal 700% damage and root enemies for 3 (+3 per stack) seconds. Recharges after 5 (+5 per stack) seconds.

name: Light Flux Pauldron
desc: Decrease skill cooldowns by 50% (+50% per stack). Decrease attack speed by 50% (+50% per stack).

name: Mercurial Rachis
desc: Creates a Ward of Power in a random location nearby that buffs both enemies and allies within 16m (+50% per stack), causing them to deal +50% damage.

name: Purity
desc: All skill cooldowns are reduced by 2 (+1 per stack) seconds. All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for an unfavorable outcome.

name: Shaped Glass
desc: Increase base damage by 100% (+100% per stack). Reduce maximum health by 50% (+50% per stack).

name: Stone Flux Pauldron
desc: Increase max health by 100% (+100% per stack). Reduce movement speed by 50% (+50% per stack).

name: Strides of Heresy
desc:
Replace your Utility Skill with Shadowfade.

Fade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 18.2% (+18.2% per stack) of your maximum health. Lasts 3 (+3 per stack) seconds.

name: Transcendence
desc: Convert all but 1 health into regenerating shields. Gain 50% (+25% per stack) maximum health.

name: Visions of Heresy
desc:
Replace your Primary Skill with Hungering Gaze.

Fire a flurry of tracking shards that detonate after a delay, dealing 120% base damage. Hold up to 12 charges (+12 per stack) that reload after 2 seconds (+2 per stack).

name: Benthic Bloom
desc: Upgrades 3 (+3 per stack) random items to items of the next higher rarity at the start of each stage. Corrupts all 57 Leaf Clovers.

name: Encrusted Key
desc: A hidden cache containing an item (60%/30%/10%) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cache consumes this item. Corrupts all Rusted Keys.

name: Lost Seer's Lenses
desc: Your attacks have a 0.5% (+0.5% per stack) chance to instantly kill a non-Boss enemy. Corrupts all Lens-Maker's Glasses.

name: Lysate Cell
desc: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Special skill. Reduces Special skill cooldown by 33%. Corrupts all Fuel Cells.

name: Needletick
desc: 10% (+10% per stack) chance to collapse an enemy for 400% base damage. Corrupts all Tri-Tip Daggers.

name: Newly Hatched Zoea
desc: Every 60 (-50% per stack) seconds, gain a random Void ally. Can have up to 1 (+1 per stack) allies at a time. Corrupts all yellow items.

name: Plasma Shrimp
desc: Gain a shield equal to 10% of your maximum health. While you have a shield, hitting an enemy fires a missile that deals 40% (+40% per stack) TOTAL damage. Corrupts all AtG Missile Mk. 1s.
modifiers: Damage, heal, HP, Shield, Missiles, on-hit effect

name: Pluripotent Larva
desc: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability, and all of your items that can be corrupted will be. Corrupts all Dio's Best Friends.

name: Polylute
desc: 25% chance to fire lightning for 60% TOTAL damage up to 3 (+3 per stack) times. Corrupts all Ukuleles.

name: Safer Spaces
desc: Blocks incoming damage once. Recharges after 15 seconds (-10% per stack) Corrupts all Tougher Times.

name: Singularity Band
desc: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also fire a black hole that draws enemies within 15m into its center. Lasts 5 seconds before collapsing, dealing 100% (+100% per stack) TOTAL damage. Recharges every 20 seconds. Corrupts all Runald's and Kjaro's Bands.

name: Tentabauble
desc: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to root enemies for 1s (+1s per stack). Corrupts all Chronobaubles.

name: Voidsent Flame
desc: Upon hitting an enemy at full health, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius for 260% (+156% per stack) base damage. Corrupts all Will-o'-the-wisps.
modifiers: Damage, heal, HP, Spawn, on-hit effect

name: Weeping Fungus
desc: Heals for 2% (+2% per stack) of your health every second while sprinting. Corrupts all Bustling Fungi.

name: Blast Shower
desc: Cleanse all negative effects. Includes debuffs, damage over time, and nearby projectiles.

name: Disposable Missile Launcher
desc: Fire a swarm of 12 missiles that deal 12x300% damage.

name: Eccentric Vase
desc: Create a quantum tunnel of up to 1000m in length. Lasts 30 seconds.

name: Executive Card
desc: Whenever you make a gold purchase, get 10% of the spent gold back. If the purchase is a multishop terminal, the other terminals will remain open.

name: Foreign Fruit
desc: Instantly heal for 50% of your maximum health.

name: Forgive Me Please
desc: Throw a cursed doll out that triggers any On-Kill effects you have every 1 second for 8 seconds.

name: Fuel Array
desc: Looks like it could power something. EXTREMELY unstable...

name: Gnarled Woodsprite
desc: Gain a Woodsprite follower that heals for 1.5% of your maximum health/second. Can be sent to an ally to heal them for 10% of their maximum health.

name: Goobo Jr.
desc: Spawn a gummy clone that has 300% damage and 300% health. Expires in 30 seconds.

name: Gorag's Opus
desc: All allies enter a frenzy for 7 seconds. Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.

name: Jade Elephant
desc: Gain 500 armor for 5 seconds.

name: Milky Chrysalis
desc: Sprout wings and fly for 15 seconds. Gain +20% movement speed for the duration.

name: Molotov (6-Pack)
desc: Throw 6 molotov cocktails that ignites enemies for 500% base damage. Each molotov leaves a burning area for 200% damage per second.

name: Ocular HUD
desc: Gain +100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.

name: Preon Accumulator
desc: Fires preon tendrils, zapping enemies within 35m for up to 600% damage/second. On contact, detonate in an enormous 20m explosion for 4000% damage.

name: Primordial Cube
desc: Fire a black hole that draws enemies within 30m into its center. Lasts 10 seconds

name: Radar Scanner
desc: Reveal all interactables within 500m for 10 seconds.

name: Recycler
desc: Transform an Item or Equipment into a different one. Can only be converted into the same tier one time.

name: Remote Caffeinator
desc: Request an Eclipse Zero Vending Machine from the UES Safe Travels. Delivery guaranteed in 5 seconds, dealing 2000% damage. Heal up to 3 targets for 25% of their maximum health.

name: Royal Capacitor
desc: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster, dealing 3000% damage and stunning nearby monsters.

name: Sawmerang
desc: Throw three large saw blades that slice through enemies for 3x400% damage. Also deals an additional 3x100% damage per second while bleeding enemies. Can strike enemies again on the way back.

name: Super Massive Leech
desc: Heal for 20% of the damage you deal. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: The Back-up
desc: Call 4 Strike Drones to fight for you. Lasts 25 seconds.

name: The Crowdfunder
desc: Fires a continuous barrage that deals 100% damage per bullet. Costs $1 per bullet. Cost increases over time.

name: Trophy Hunter's Tricorn
desc: Execute any enemy capable of spawning a unique reward, and it will drop that item. Equipment is consumed on use.

name: Volcanic Egg
desc: Turn into a draconic fireball for 5 seconds. Deal 500% damage on impact. Detonates at the end for 800% damage.

name: Effigy of Grief
desc: ALL characters within are slowed by 50% and have their armor reduced by 20. Can place up to 5.

name: Glowing Meteorite
desc: Rain meteors from the sky, damaging ALL characters for 600% damage per blast. Lasts 20 seconds.

name: Helfire Tincture
desc: Ignite ALL characters within 15m for 12s. Deal 5% of your maximum health/second as burning as damage. The burn is 0.5x stronger on yourself, 0.25x stronger on allies, and 24x stronger on enemies.

name: Spinel Tonic
desc:
Drink the Tonic, gaining a boost for 20 seconds. Increases damage by +100%. Increases attack speed by +70%. Increases armor by +20. Increases maximum health by +50%. Increases passive health regeneration by +300%. Increases movespeed by +30%.

When the Tonic wears off, you have a 20% chance to gain a Tonic Affliction, reducing all of your stats by -5% (-5% per stack).
modifiers: Damage, heal, HP, Armor, Attack Speed

name: Her Biting Embrace
desc: Become an aspect of ice.

name: His Reassurance
desc: Become an aspect of earth.

name: Ifrit's Distinction
desc: Become an aspect of fire.

name: N'kuhana's Retort
desc: Become an aspect of corruption.

name: Shared Design
desc: Become an aspect of perfection.

name: Silence Between Two Strikes
desc: Become an aspect of lightning.

name: Spectral Circlet
desc: Become an aspect of incorporeality.
